newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot catlle not well tested - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot catlle not well tested - USDA.

text.p: Trade was very slow in the Panhandle Tuesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers not well tested. Feedlots reporting moderate inquiry from buyers.
Sales confirmed on 100 head slaughter steers; 19,700 head confirmed for week to date which includes 14,600 head formulated and 400 head previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Pen Select, few Choice 2-3 1200 lbs 66.00.
Confirmed - 100 Week Ago - None Year Ago - 2,700
Wk to Date - 19,700 Week Ago - 11,500 Year Ago - 45,400
